Sites::GetSiteByIdSite (  $  idSite  ) 
 

Gets the Site which property TableSite::TABLE_COLUMN_IDSITE has the value $idSite

Parameters:
$idSite the id of the Site to be looked for
Returns:
- the Site object which property TableSite::TABLE_COLUMN_IDSITE has the value $idSite

- an Errors object in case of error(s) :

SiteError::SITE_NOT_LOADED if Site has not been loaded from the database or doesn't exist
